entrance.name: Entrance Hall
entrance.description: You are standing in the main entrance hall, where sunlight spills through tall glass doors and reflects off the smooth tile floor. To the west, a wide doorway leads to the theatre. To the east, a hallway stretches toward the cafeteria and library. Straight ahead, a staircase descends to the lower floor.

items.name: Notebook
items.description: Welcome to ThE SuPeR FuN ScHoOl oF BaYvIeW GlEn, where students and teachers have been turned into Monsters that you must defeat. The main objective of this game is to ESCAPE THE SCHOOL. You must explore the school, defeat bosses, and most important of all............ survive (or die, if you want). Use the keyword: help, if you want the commands :). Have Fun! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)╭∩╮

theatre.name: Theatre
theatre.description: You enter a dim, quiet space lined with rows of cushioned seats facing a closed stage. Thick red curtains drape the front, and the faint scent of paint and wood lingers. Shadows stretch backstage, where props and sets rest unseen. To the east is the entrance hall. A hallway extends south, leading deeper into the arts wing.

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. It has a burger charm.

2F staircase.name: Central Staircase
2F staircase.description: A spiraling staircase winds between floors, enclosed in smooth concrete and metal railings. Your footsteps echo with each turn. Cool air drifts from below, and warm light filters from the floor above. This central stairwell connects all three levels—up to the third floor, down to the lower level, and north back to the entrance hall.

hallway1.name: Hallway 1
hallway1.description: This wide hallway runs east to west, connecting key parts of the main floor. To the north, large windows reveal the cafeteria. To the south, a glass door leads into the quiet library. At the far east end, an exit opens to the outside. Behind you to the west lies the entrance hall.

npc.name: caitlin
npc.description: A person that resembles a sphere. She is holding a snack in her hand while shoving some more food into her mouth. Its rather disgusting...

cafeteria.name: Cafeteria
cafeteria.description: You enter a large room that smells of food. You see rows of tables and chairs that resemble a jail cafeteria. There is a designated seat, that looks rather large, for someone named Caitlin.

items.name: Butterknife
items.description: For smearing butter on bread, among other purposes

npc.name: Ms. Charesse
npc.description: A cashier with a warm smile that somehow survived the apocalypse. Despite everything, she hums softly as she works, offering kind words to anyone who approaches—like the world hasn't fallen apart outside the cafeteria walls.

library.name: Learning Commons
library.description: Books line the walls, and tables are arranged around the large space. It's quiet.

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. It seems to have a flask keychain on it.

npc.name: Mr Stott
npc.description: He seems to be blabbering about opportunity costs and scarcity. His luscious blonde hair drapes down to the floor.
npc.talk: Did you evaluate the marginal benefit of going to another room?

hallway3.name: hallway3
hallway3.description: Remains of scavenged food lies on the ground. There are rooms in all four directions.

music room.name: Music Room
music room.description: There are rows of plastic chairs and music stands. Piles of messy sheet music are stacked on a table to the side. A tuba seems to have angered someone, and is laying destroyed in the corner.

gr.11 common area.name: Gr.11 Common Area
gr.11 common area.description: Sofas are arranged against the walls, and there seems to be a back door that was boarded up some time ago. There is a suspicious stain on the ground.

drama room.name: Drama Room
drama room.description: There are overturned tables, chairs, and racks of costumes. Looks like the theater kids just had their production of The Three Musketeers in here.

items.name: Play Sword
items.description: A flimsy metal sword used for various plays

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. It has a little keyboard charm.

npc.name: Mr. Clark
npc.description: A jolly man that has a booming voice. Do not be decived by his looks for he is fearsome with his writing and dramatic acts
npc.talk: DID YOU INDENT YOUR PARAGRAPHS? HAHAHAHAHA

hallway2.name: Hallway 2
hallway2.description: Lockers line both walls, one of them seems to be unlocked. There are doors leading both to the north and the south.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description: There are bandages, cotton swabs, antiseptic, and alcohol wipes inside.

items.name: Chips
items.description: You didn't think there would be an unopened bag of doritos here.

1F hallway1.name: 1F Hallway 1
1F hallway1.description: The lower level is musty and dank. A staircase leads up, and the dark hallway continues to the east. There are two double doors to the south and west.

gym.name: Gym
gym.description: A large variety of round objects are strewn across the floor: dodgeballs, basketballs, tennis balls, a human head...

items.name: Tennis Racket
items.description: You have any tennis balls to hit?

npc.name: Ms. Deeks
npc.description: A very buff gym teacher whos's very enthusiastic about winter fest.
npc.talk: Exercising is best for your mental health!

IT.name: IT Department
IT.description: You are faced with a pile of smashed computers and a whole bunch of scary looking wires.

1F hallway2.name: 1F Hallway 2
1F hallway2.description: The hallway continues west. There are doors to the north and south, and an area to the east.

science lab.name: Science Labratory
science lab.description: You take one look at the flask on the table. So that's where the smell's coming from.

items.name: flask
items.description: ... it could do something maybe??? ... I would leave now

npc.name: Ms. Landau
npc.description: A scary science teacher. Yet, she has a warming prescence.

npc.name: Ms. Russell
npc.description: A kind woman who seems to be trying to stop the fearsome Ms. Landau but unfortunately she is too fearsome
npc.talk: Hi! Hope you are doing well!

gr.12 common area.name: Gr.12 Common Area
gr.12 common area.description: There are chairs and tables scattered around the space.

npc.name: Sophia
npc.description: a grade 12, who wants to be batman..... ur choice ig??

npc.name: Gigi
npc.description: another gr 12, who is friends with 'batman' or so she says

classroom.name: Classroom
classroom.description: It's a classroom. Not much to see here, except for something in the corner. Oh, don't mind the severed hand on that desk over there.

npc.name: Ms. Carpenter
npc.description: An athletic looking teacher who looks like she could out smart you, and probably can...
npc.talk: I WILL NEVER SETTLE FOR SECOND! I AM FIRST!

1F staircase.name: 1F Staircase
1F staircase.description: The stairwell is dark without any natural light. A ray of sunlight streams in from above where the stairs continue upwards. A door leads to the lower level to the south.

3F staircase.name: 3F Staircase
3F staircase.description: You are at the top. There's a door that leads to the rest of the 3rd floor, and the staircase winds down.

3F hallway1.name: 3F Hallway 1
3F hallway1.description: The hallway continues east, with 2 rooms to the south and west. The staircase is at the north.

3F hallway2.name: 3F Hallway 2
3F hallway2.description: The hallway continues west, with rooms in all three other directions.

gr.9 common area.name: gr.9 Common Area
gr.9 common area.description: Couches line the walls of the small space. Snacks and garbage cover eavery inch of the carpeted floor.

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. It has an addition sign on it.

compsci room.name: Computer Science Classroom
compsci room.description: It's just a regular classroom, except on the board there is a lesson on Arraylists. A man sits at the table in front of the board, typing menacingly.

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. It has the rusted words h_ad _f sc_ool.

npc.name: Mr.Delauriers
npc.description: Average white man turned zombie, he will stop at nothing to eat your brains
npc.talk: DID YOU COMMIT YOUR CODE TO GITHUB??

math lab.name: Math Lab
math lab.description: Red marks cover the glass walls along with the various math equations, but otherwise everything is surprisingly well kept. A man stands behind a desk.

npc.name: Mr.Pape
npc.description: A middle-aged math teacher who turned bald a bit too soon. His head gleams brighter than the beaming sun. He seems to have hoarded an array of belongings which he seems very protective of.
npc.talk: Math lab is closed today MWAHAHAH. I'll give you pity marks because you're too stupid.

principle's office.name: Principle's Office
principle's office.description: It's dark and scary in here.

items.name: key
items.description: A miniscule key. Being the key of all keys, it gleams a light of glory.

npc.name: Ms. Fenili
npc.description: An overwhelming authority figure. Chills run down your spine within 20 meters of her. She greets you with a kind smile, opposite of your first impression of her, and goes on her merry way.

gr.10 common area.name: Gr.10 Common Area
gr.10 common area.description: Couches are arranged around a small Christmas tree in the middle. It looks sad.

npc.name: Ms. Bala
npc.description: A menacing teacher. She likes jokes a lot.
npc.talk: You're homework is late. Do you want detention?

exit.name: Exit
exit.description: You pull open the heavy metal door, and with a rush of air and light, you step into freedom—it's over. (づoωo)づᕦ(ᵔoᵔᕦ)
